src:
Volej Markana obradovao Porto, Familikao i Sporting kiksnuli u gostima (VIDEO)
Benfika izgleda ima samo jednog pravog rivala za titulu...

03 Nov 2019

Interesantan nedeljni program u portugalskoj Primeiri upotpunili su kiksevi Sportinga iz Lisabona i Familikaoa na gostovanjima, kao i minimalni trijumf Porta kod kuće kojim su puleni Serža Konseisaoa održali dva koraka zaostatka u odnosu na lidera Benfiku na tabeli.
Zmajevi su na svom Dragau igrali onoliko koliko im je bilo potrebno, a otpor borbenog Avesa (1:0) slomio je brazilski štoper Ivan Markano sjajnim volej udarcem u 13. minutu na centaršut Otavija sa desne strane. Porto je dominirao tokom celog meča, imao još nekoliko izglednih šansi da ubedljivije slavi, ali je sve ostalo na tom jednom pogotku. Lepom u svakom slučaju...



Mnogo zanimljiviji meč odigran je u Bragi, u čuvenom kamenolomu, gde je najprijatnije iznenađenje u sezoni zaustavljeno od strane ekipe Rikarda Sa Pinta. Iako je Familikao ostao sa desetoricom još sredinom prvog poluvremena zbog isključenja Roderika to mu nije smetalo da povede u nastavku preko Tonija Martineza.
Međutim, brojčano nadmoćnija Braga je sačekala da se gosti umore i za samo dva minuta u 77. i 78. preko Vandersona Galenja preokrenula rezultat i povela sa 2:1. Potpuno zasluženo. Međutim, opet je sjajni novajlija iskazao potpunu upornost koja se isplatila u 89. minutu kada je Anderson postavio konačnih 2:2. Po ukusu gostiju. Igrao je na ovom meču za goste i Uroš Račić i to od početka drugog poluvremena kada je zamenio Gugu.
Posrnuli velikan zeleno-belih boja Sporting kiksnuo je kao gost u Tondeli gde je premio gol u 88. minutu, a strleac je bio izvesni Vilson. Time je zaustavljena serija Lavova od tri vezane pobede, taman kada se pomislilo da su izašli iz rezultatkske krize posle dolaska novog trenera Silasa. Tako su i oni uvećali zaostatak nad velikim rivalom Benfikom koja im beži čak deset bodova.

PRIMIERA - 10. kolo

SubotaBenfika - Rio Ave 2:0 (1:0)/Diaz 31, Pici 51/
Moreirense - Viktorija Gimaraeš 1:1 (0:0)/Vitorija 56 - Tapsoba 49/
NedeljaŽil Visente - Maritimo 2:0 (0:0)/Lima 77. penal, 83/
Tondela - Sporting Lisabon 1:0 (0:0)/Vilson 88/
Porto - Aves 1:0 (1:0)/Markano 13/
Braga - Familikao 2:2 (0:0)/V. Galenjo 77, 78 - Toni Martinez 47, Anderson 89/

Ponedeljak


​20.00: (2.45) Belenenšeš (3.10) Fereira (3.10)



22.00: (2.45) Setubal (2.80) Boavista (3.40)



22.00: (2.20) Portimonense (3.10) Santa Klara (3.60)




*kvote su podložne promenama






Foto:
 Reuters
text:
Volley Markan Rejoices Porto, Familicao and Sporting Kicks Away (VIDEO)
Benfica seems to have only one real rival for the title ...

03 Nov 2019

An interesting weekly program in Portuguese Primeira was complemented by Sporting Lisbon and Familikao's away fixtures, as well as the Port's minimal triumph at home that kept Sergen Conseisao's punts two steps behind Benfica's leaderboard.
The Dragons played as much as they needed on their Drag, and the resistance of the struggling Aves (1-0) broke Brazilian stopper Ivan Markano with a brilliant volley in the 13th minute on the center of Ottawa on the right. Porto dominated throughout the match, with a few more chances to celebrate more convincingly, but all that remained was one goal. Nice anyway ...



A much more interesting match was played in Braga, the famous quarry, where the most pleasant surprise of the season was stopped by the team of Ricardo Sa Pinto. Although Familicao stayed with ten in the middle of the first half due to Roderick's expulsion, he did not mind taking the lead through Tony Martinez.
However, Braga, outnumbered, waited for the guests to get tired, and in just two minutes in 77 and 78, Vanderson Galen reversed the score and led with 2: 1. Well deserved. However, again the brilliant newcomer showed complete persistence, which paid off in the 89th minute when Anderson set the final 2: 2. To the taste of the guests. Uros Racic also played in this away match from the beginning of the second half when he replaced Gugu.
The stumbling green-and-white giant Sporting made a pitch as a guest at Tondela where he scored a goal in the 88th minute, with Wilson as the scorer. This stopped the Lions' three-game winning streak, just when it came to thinking that they were out of the resultant crisis after the arrival of the new Silas coach. Thus, they also increased their backlog against their big rival Benfica, which was ten points behind them.

PRIMIERA - Round 10

SaturdayBenfica - Rio Ave 2: 0 (1: 0) / Diaz 31, Pici 51 /
Moreirense - Victoria Guimaraes 1: 1 (0: 0) / Vitoria 56 - Tapsoba 49 /
SundayJill Visente - Maritimo 2: 0 (0: 0) / Lima 77th Penalty, 83 /
Tondela - Sporting Lisbon 1: 0 (0: 0) / Wilson 88 /
Porto - Aves 1: 0 (1: 0) / Markano 13 /
Braga - Familicao 2: 2 (0: 0) / V. Galenjo 77, 78 - Toni Martinez 47, Anderson 89 /
